titleStmt.title: Receipt January 7, 256 BC
titleStmt.author: Herieus, son of Paroites, 4 in Pap.Lugd.Bat. XXI, p. 325

msContents.summary: Duplicate receipt for loan at 4 obols per aroura: money paid for cutting out brushwood

msItem.note: Written along the fibers with 6 lines; on the back, across the fibers, 2 lines of writing

provenance.p: Purchased by Columbia University from Dr. Kondilios through H.I. Bell in December 1926; no. 85 in Bell's inventory

div.ab: Year 29, Hathyr 14. Erieus son of Paroites of Troia has received cutting out brushwood upon 5 arouras, at 4 obols [per aroura], 3 drachmas 2 obols. [Verso:j Hathyr 14. [Account of] money payments

listBibl.bibl: P.Col. III 22 P.Col.Zen. I 22 Published in JEA 16 (1930) 24-30 and Seminarium Kondakovianum 4 (1931) 205-210; correction to line 6 by Pestman, Pap.Lugd.Bat. XX 11 note e
